Interface IDirectory

extends IFileSystemEntry

      Attempts to pull the directory (and its contents) from the given Device to a library-specific location on the host.

      Attempts to pull the directory (and its contents) from the Device to a given location on the host.

      The same as IDirectory#pullDirectory(File).

      Attempts to remove the directory from the file system.

      • mkdir

        boolean mkdir()
       throws CannotTouchException
        Attempts to create a directory on the device's file system.
        Returns:

      • remove

        boolean remove(boolean recurse)
        throws CannotRemoveException
        Attempts to remove the directory from the file system.
        Parameters:
        recurse - Sets a value determining whether to recurse through the directory to delete it. (Directories with content cannot be deleted without it)
        Returns:
        true if deletion was successful. false otherwise.
        Throws:
        CannotRemoveException
